title: Arbor Snowboards :: Erik Leon - Full Part 2
description:
Before the start of the 2014/15 winter season, Erik Leon made the paramount life decision of chopping off his iconic and lengthy dreadlocks. While many worried that, like the biblical character Samson, Erik would too lose his supernatural powers without his hair, Erik fought against the odds and emerged from the battlefield of winter with a bloody good full part in hand.
Filmed By: Matt Devino, Jason Privett, Sean Black
Additional Filming By: Colton Morgan, Jim Dunigan
Edit: Kyle Schafer // @juptierpeople
Music: Motorama "Ghost"
